PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-05102022-05-18,  PWGSC,  ,  , 
ActNational Capital Act
PrecisRe-appointment of MARC SEAMAN of Ottawa, Ontario, as Chairperson of the National Capital Commission, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on June 5, 2023, or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first, effective June 7, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
